subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Ankles (Body Part)
lead_paragraph: Trainer Nick Zito said that X-rays revealed a small fracture in the left front ankle of War Pass, last year’s Breeders’ Cup Juvenile winner.
snippet: Trainer Nick Zito said that X-rays revealed a small fracture in the left front ankle of War Pass, last year’s Breeders’ Cup Juvenile winner.
